00033 void RealTimeClock::getDate(timeval &date) {
00034   gettimeofday(&date, NULL);
00035 }

00037 // structors :
00038 
00039 RealTimeClock::RealTimeClock(double secondsPerTick) 
00040   :Clock(secondsPerTick/1000),
00041    m_started(false), m_tick(0), m_floatTick(secondsPerTick),
00042    m_secondsPerTick(to_timeval(secondsPerTick)) {}
00043 
00044 RealTimeClock::RealTimeClock(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node)
00045   :Clock(0.001), m_started(false), m_tick(0) {
00046   rapidxml::xml_attribute<> *tick = node.first_attribute("tick");
00047   if( NULL==tick ) 
00048     throw Exception("Missing tick attribute.");
00049   m_floatTick = string_cast<double>(std::string(tick->value(),
00050                                           tick->value_size()));
00051   if( m_floatTick<=0.0 )
00052     throw Exception("Negative duration in tick attribute.");
00053   m_secondsPerTick = to_timeval(m_floatTick);
00054 }
00055 
00056 // modifiers :
00057 
00058 void RealTimeClock::start() {
00059   getDate(m_nextTickDate);
00060   setNextTickDate();
00061   m_started = true;
00062 }
00063 
00064 void RealTimeClock::setNextTickDate(unsigned factor) {
00065   m_nextTickDate += m_secondsPerTick*factor;
00066 }
00067 
00068 TICK RealTimeClock::getNextTick() {
00069   mutex_type::scoped_lock guard(m_lock);
00070   
00071   if( m_started ) {
00072     double howLate = -timeLeft();
00073 
00074     if( howLate>=0.0 ) {
00075       double ratio = howLate/m_floatTick;
00076       int tickIncr = 1+static_cast<int>(std::floor(ratio));
00077       
00078       m_tick += tickIncr;
00079       setNextTickDate(tickIncr);
00080       // If more than 10% late indicate the issue in the log
00081       if( ratio>=0.1 ) {
00082        std::ostringstream oss;
00083        oss<<"Clock]["<<m_tick;
00084        m_log->syslog(oss.str())<<howLate<<" secs late."<<std::endl;
00085       }
00086     }
00087   }
00088   return m_tick;
00089 }
00090 
00091 // observers :
00092 
00093 double RealTimeClock::timeLeft() const {
00094   timeval tv;
00095   getDate(tv);
00096   return to_double(m_nextTickDate-tv);
00097 }
00098 
00099 double RealTimeClock::getSleepDelay() const {
00100   if( m_started ) {
00101     double delay;
00102     TICK tick;
00103     {
00104       mutex_type::scoped_lock guard(m_lock);
00105       delay = timeLeft();
00106       tick = m_tick;
00107     }
00108     if( delay<0.0 ) {
00109       // If we are already late log it
00110       std::ostringstream oss;
00111       oss<<"Clock]["<<m_tick;
00112       m_log->syslog(oss.str())<<(-delay)
00113                            <<" secs late before sleep."
00114                            <<std::endl;
00115       delay = 0.0;
00116     }
00117     return delay;
00118   } else 
00119     return Clock::getSleepDelay();
00120 }
